languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} targets a single enemy, vowing to dispatch their mark. The Bladedancer's next attack against their selected enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} along with an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Reaper swears to bring down one target enemy. Next Reaper's attack against that enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried, and if the target dies from this attack, reaper restores 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}, gains an additional attack this turn and regains {uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used any number of times each turn, but it grants additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Action Point{/g} and an additional attack only once per round.

The Bladedancer swears to bring down one enemy of their choice. The Bladedancer's next attack against that enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack this turn.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and an additional attack only once per round.

The Bladedancer swears to bring down one enemy of their choice. The Bladedancer's next attack against that enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack this turn.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and an additional attack only once per round.

The Bladedancer targets a single enemy, vowing to dispatch their mark. The Bladedancer's next attack against their selected enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} along with an additional attack this turn.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack only once per round.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} targets a single enemy, vowing to dispatch their mark. The Bladedancer's next attack against their selected enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} along with an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} selecciona a un enemigo y jura acabar con él. El próximo ataque del hoja danzante contra el enemigo seleccionado no puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivarse{/g} ni desviarse. Si el ataque mata al objetivo, el hoja danzante recupera +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y un ataque adicional durante este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} puede usarse varias veces por turno, pero solo otorga +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y un ataque adicional una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} targets a single enemy, vowing to dispatch their mark. The Bladedancer's next attack against their selected enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} along with an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} selecciona a un enemigo y jura acabar con él. El próximo ataque del hoja danzante contra el enemigo seleccionado no puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivarse{/g} ni desviarse. Si el ataque mata al objetivo, el hoja danzante recupera +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y un ataque adicional durante este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} puede usarse varias veces por turno, pero solo otorga +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y un ataque adicional una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は敵1体をターゲットとし、そのマーク相手を処刑すると誓う。選択した敵に対するブレードダンサーの次の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}や受け流しができない。この攻撃でターゲットを倒した場合、ブレードダンサーは+{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}と+1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}での追加攻撃を回復する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は1ターンに複数回使用できるが、+1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と追加攻撃の回復は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に1回のみである。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} targets a single enemy, vowing to dispatch their mark. The Bladedancer's next attack against their selected enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} along with an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は敵1体をターゲットとし、そのマーク相手を処刑すると誓う。選択した敵に対するブレードダンサーの次の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}やパリィができない。この攻撃でターゲットを倒した場合、ブレードダンサーは+{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}と+1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}での追加攻撃を回復する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は1ターンに複数回使用できるが、+1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と追加攻撃の回復は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に1回のみである。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}标记单个敌人，发誓消灭目标。刀锋舞者对标记敌人的下次攻击无法被{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，也无法被招架。如果刀锋舞者的攻击杀死了被标记的目标，则会恢复{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}与1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，且在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得1次额外攻击机会。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以在单个回合内多次使用，但每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}最多只能获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与1次额外攻击机会。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} targets a single enemy, vowing to dispatch their mark. The Bladedancer's next attack against their selected enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} along with an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}标记单个敌人，发誓消灭目标。刀锋舞者对标记敌人的下次攻击无法被{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，也无法被招架。如果刀锋舞者的攻击杀死了被标记的目标，则会恢复{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}与1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，且在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得1次额外攻击机会。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以在单个回合内多次使用，但每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}最多只能获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与1次额外攻击机会。

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} cible un ennemi et jure de l'éliminer. Sa prochaine attaque contre l'ennemi sélectionné ne peut pas être {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivée{/g} ou parée. Si l'attaque tue la cible, le danselame récupère +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} points de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et gagne +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} ainsi qu'une attaque supplémentaire pour ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais n'accorde +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et une attaque supplémentaire qu'une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}tour{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} targets a single enemy, vowing to dispatch their mark. The Bladedancer's next attack against their selected enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} along with an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais n'accorde +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et une attaque supplémentaire qu'une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}tour{/g}.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} visiert ein Einzelziel an und schwört, es auszuschalten. Gegen den nächsten Angriff des Klingentänzers gegen den gewählten Gegner ist kein {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} oder Parieren möglich. Tötet dieser Angriff das Ziel, regeneriert der Klingentänzer +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und erhält +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} sowie einen zusätzlichen Angriff mit diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, gewährt einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und einen zusätzlichen Angriff.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} targets a single enemy, vowing to dispatch their mark. The Bladedancer's next attack against their selected enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried. If this attack kills the target, the Bladedancer regains +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} along with an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and an additional attack only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Tötet dieser Angriff das Ziel, regeneriert der Klingentänzer +{uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und erhält +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} sowie einen zusätzlichen Angriff mit diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, gewährt einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und einen zusätzlichen Angriff.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} выбирает врага, давая клятву его уничтожить. Этот враг не сможет избежать следующей атаки танцора смерти {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонением{/g} или парированием. Если в результате этой атаки враг погибает, танцор смерти восстанавливает {uip|Heal|590c990c1d684fd09ae883754d28a8ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и дополнительную атаку в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}.
Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} можно применять несколько раз за ход, но +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и дополнительную атаку она дает только один раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
